items.title: County Board of Supervisors to host and attend January 12, 2021 meeting virtually
items.summary: On Tuesday, January 12, the Solano County Board of Supervisors, in abundance of caution, and to help slow the spread of COVID-19 disease in the community, will host, conduct and attend their meeting virtually, and not in person. The Board Chambers will be closed to the public.

items.title: Solano County to implement state-mandated regional stay-at-home order starting Thursday evening
items.summary: Starting Thursday, December 17, 2020 at 11:59 p.m., Solano County will implement the state's mandated regional stay-at-home order, a protective measure to limit the spread of COVID-19 disease and support the most vulnerable community members and hospital frontline workers.
